name: circuitously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not straight or direct: We entered a beautiful valley through which the river circuitously takes its course. He arrived at his final career quite circuitously. See
circuitous
More examplesFewer examplesIt is an amazingly clever, circuitously fascinating novel. I went circuitously home, taking all the back ways.One end of the channel circuitously led to the Gulf, the other to a dead end.
